directions.step:
Combine amaretto and brown sugar, stirring until sugar dissolves. Process amaretto mixture and ice cream in a blender until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides. Pour into 6 individual freezer-proof serving dishes; cover and freeze overnight. Makes 6 servings.
